triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: The paper develops novel adaptive control laws for systems with uncertain parameters.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses consensus problems in multiagent systems with nonlinear dynamics.

triples.name: Nonlinear system
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on control of high-order nonlinear multiagent systems.

triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: The paper applies backstepping method as the control design technique.

triples.name: Hermite interpolation
triples.relevance: The paper uses Hermite interpolation to modify estimators to obtain polynomial form.

triples.name: Consensus (computer science)
triples.relevance: The paper investigates consensus problems for multiagent systems.

triples.name: Distributed control system
triples.relevance: The paper develops distributed adaptive control approach for networked multiagent systems.

triples.name: Estimation theory
triples.relevance: The paper develops distributed parameter estimators to estimate unknown leader parameters.
